alert.note: Alert for Laurel; Pulaski; Rockcastle (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:31PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Laurel, northeastern Pulaski and central Rockcastle Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 531 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Billows, or 12 miles south of Mount Vernon, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Billows around 540 PM EDT. Hazel Patch around 545 PM EDT. Wood Creek Lake around 550 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bernstadt, Bunch, Hare, London, Pittsburg, Carmichael, Sublimity City, Hightop, London-Corbin Airport and East Bernstadt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
